page.title: 07RELIGION IN HUNTLY
page.content: The Jehovah Witnesses meet in Kingdom Hall. The Huntly congregation of witnesses has an average attendance of 50 people. There is no minister. The hall can seat 80 comfortably, but, has room for 150. The meetings take place in the hall. On a Sunday the Parish Church has an attendance of 400. Most of these people are old, but, there are a few young ones. 1000 people are on the church roll. The church can seat up to 1200 people. Strathbogie Church can hold 800 people. Each Sunday there is an attendance of 150. There are 1500 people on the church roll. Both of the above churches have a Sunday School
